title: Riot, when can we expect to have our Snowdown Skins?
body: I am hyped for Snowday Gnar, when can we expect to have them by?

replies.body: They're in the store now! Happy Snowdown!

I just checked my client, they're there for me. But I don't have any RP rip lol
http://i.imgur.com/qvpmxgB.jpg
The site says they are going to be released to today. i don't know when though.
